name: Dog Wick
description:
They killed my best friend... Now I will kill them all! Avenge your best friend in this fast paced shoot 'em up! Shoot, Dodge and Kill in this 2D top down mayhem! Download Now for Free! Keen to see more games and projects by me?  Check out my website! joshtulleners.com
Assets used in game

Game Map made from assets from Kenny.nl (CC0 1.0 Universal)

Explosion Animation by appdurov from https://appdurov.itch.io/various-particle (CCO)

Font: Comic Sans by Vincent Connare and released by Microsoft Corporation.

Music and sound effects made by my girlfriend Darcy <3

All other assets made by Josh Tulleners (Me)
